description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国福建省的省会，国家区域中心城市，位于福建省东部的闽江下游，是福建省的政治、经济、文化、交通中心。
description.en: The capital of Fujian Province, People's Republic of China, a national regional central city, located in the lower reaches of the Min River in the eastern part of Fujian Province, serving as the political, economic, cultural, and transportation center of the province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任中共福州市委书记。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Party Secretary of Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任福州市人大常委会主任。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Fuzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任福州市人民政府市长。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Mayor of the Fuzhou Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，现任福州市政协主席。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, currently serving as the Chairman of the Fuzhou Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国共产党福州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党福州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在福州市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 福州市的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Fuzhou City.

description.zh-cn: 福州市的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Fuzhou City.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议福州市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议福州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在福州市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代由古闽人所建立的国家，都城为冶。
description.en: An ancient kingdom established by the Min people in ancient China, with its capital at Ye.

description.zh-cn: 闽越国的都城，福州历史上最早的城市。
description.en: The capital of the Minyue Kingdom, the earliest city in the history of Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 闽越王，在福州冶山一带的冶城建都。
description.en: King of Minyue, who established his capital at Yecheng in the area of Yeshan, Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 西晋时期晋安郡首位太守。
description.en: The first prefect of Jin'an Commandery during the Western Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 奠定后世福州城雏形的城池。
description.en: The inner city that laid the foundation for the later Fuzhou city.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期闽国创建者。
description.en: Founder of the Min Kingdom during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的十国之一，定都福州。
description.en: One of the Ten Kingdoms during the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, with its capital in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 北宋时期福州知州，倡导种植榕树。
description.en: Prefect of Fuzhou during the Northern Song dynasty, who advocated for the planting of banyan trees.

description.zh-cn: 北宋时期福州知州，组织“编户植榕”。
description.en: Prefect of Fuzhou during the Northern Song dynasty, who organized households to plant banyan trees.

description.zh-cn: 福州市的市树，福州因此得名“榕城”。
description.en: The city tree of Fuzhou, which is why Fuzhou is nicknamed 'Banyan City'.

description.zh-cn: 南宋皇帝，曾在福州即位。
description.en: An emperor of the Southern Song dynasty who was enthroned in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 明代将领，曾在福建平定倭寇。
description.en: A general of the Ming dynasty who suppressed Wokou pirates in Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初至16世纪，活跃于朝鲜、中国沿海的海盗集团。
description.en: Pirate groups active along the coasts of China and Korea from the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties to the 16th century.

description.zh-cn: 意大利耶稣会传教士，将天主教传入福州。
description.en: An Italian Jesuit missionary who introduced Catholicism to Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 南明皇帝，在福州即位。
description.en: An emperor of the Southern Ming dynasty who was enthroned in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 晚清洋务运动中创建的建造现代舰船的机构。
description.en: An institution established during the late Qing Self-Strengthening Movement for building modern warships.

nodes.id: 中华民国军政府闽都督府

zh-cn: 中华民国军政府闽都督府

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十九路军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十九路军

description.zh-cn: 由十九路军在福建事变中成立的政权，定都福州。
description.en: A regime established by the 19th Route Army during the Fujian Rebellion, with its capital in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 时任福州市委书记习近平谋划的一项使福州成为国际化大都市的战略工程。
description.en: A strategic project planned by then Fuzhou Party Secretary Xi Jinping to make Fuzhou an international metropolis.

relationships.target: 中国共产党福州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 郭宁宁任中共福州市委书记。
description.en: Guo Ningning serves as the Secretary of the Fuzhou Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 张忠当选福州市人大常委会主任。
description.en: Zhang Zhong was elected Director of the Standing Committee of the Fuzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 吴贤德任福州市人民政府市长。
description.en: Wu Xiande serves as the Mayor of the Fuzhou Municipal People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议福州市委员会

description.zh-cn: 刘卓群当选福州市政协主席。
description.en: Liu Zhuoqun was elected Chairman of the Fuzhou Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 闽越国建立都城冶，是福州历史上最早的城市。
description.en: The Minyue Kingdom established its capital at Ye, which was the earliest city in Fuzhou's history.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝于公元前110年灭亡闽越国。
description.en: The Han dynasty conquered the Minyue Kingdom in 110 BC.

description.zh-cn: 西晋太康年间，晋安郡首位太守严高修筑了福州子城，奠定了后世福州城的雏形。
description.en: During the Taikang era of the Western Jin dynasty, Yan Gao, the first prefect of Jin'an Commandery, constructed the Fuzhou Zicheng (inner city), laying the foundation for the future city of Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 王审知于909年建立闽国，定都福州。
description.en: Wang Shenzhi founded the Min Kingdom in 909, establishing its capital in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 1044年，时任福州知州的蔡襄倡导在福州种植榕树。
description.en: In 1044, Cai Xiang, then prefect of Fuzhou, advocated for the planting of banyan trees in the city.

description.zh-cn: 1065年，知州张伯玉组织“编户植榕”，使福州榕树遍布，“榕城”之名由此而来。
description.en: In 1065, Prefect Zhang Boyu organized a campaign for households to plant banyan trees, making them widespread in Fuzhou and earning the city its nickname 'Banyan City'.

description.zh-cn: 南宋益王赵昰在福州称帝，是为宋端宗，升福州为福安府，作为行在。
description.en: Zhao Shi, Prince Yi of the Southern Song, was enthroned in Fuzhou as Emperor Duanzong, elevating Fuzhou to Fu'an Prefecture and making it the temporary imperial capital.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古军队于1276年11月攻占福州，宋端宗从海路南逃。
description.en: The Mongol army captured Fuzhou in November 1276, forcing Emperor Duanzong to flee south by sea.

description.zh-cn: 嘉靖年间，戚继光曾两度入闽平定倭寇。
description.en: During the Jiajing reign, Qi Jiguang entered Fujian twice to suppress the Wokou pirates.

description.zh-cn: 1624年底，艾儒略将天主教传入福州。
description.en: At the end of 1624, Giulio Aleni introduced Catholicism to Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 明唐王朱聿键在福州称帝，是为隆武帝，定福州为行在，号“福京”。
description.en: Zhu Yujian, Prince of Tang of the Ming dynasty, was enthroned in Fuzhou as the Longwu Emperor, designating Fuzhou as the imperial capital with the name 'Fujing'.

description.zh-cn: 1646年，清军击溃隆武政权后攻占福州。
description.en: In 1646, the Qing army defeated the Longwu regime and captured Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 鸦片战争之后，福州于1844年作为五口之一正式开埠。
description.en: After the Opium War, Fuzhou was officially opened as one of the five treaty ports in 1844.

description.zh-cn: 1866年，在洋务运动期间，清政府在马尾设立福州船政局。
description.en: In 1866, during the Self-Strengthening Movement, the Qing government established the Fuzhou Arsenal in Mawei.

description.zh-cn: 1884年的马江海战导致福建水师几乎全军覆没。
description.en: The Battle of Fuzhou in 1884 resulted in the near-total annihilation of the Fujian Fleet.

relationships.target: 中华民国军政府闽都督府

description.zh-cn: 1911年11月8日，中国同盟会策动福建新军起义，于11日成立中华民国军政府闽都督府。
description.en: On November 8, 1911, the Tongmenghui instigated an uprising of the Fujian New Army, leading to the establishment of the Military Government of Fujian of the Republic of China on the 11th.

relationships.source: 国民革命军第十九路军

description.zh-cn: 1933年11月20日，十九路军在福州发动福建事变。
description.en: On November 20, 1933, the 19th Route Army launched the Fujian Rebellion in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 福建事变后，于1933年11月22日成立中华共和国，定都福州。
description.en: After the Fujian Rebellion, the Chinese Republic was established on November 22, 1933, with its capital in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正调遣军队进攻福建，于1934年1月16日占领福州，中华共和国随之瓦解。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek dispatched troops to attack Fujian, capturing Fuzhou on January 16, 1934, which led to the collapse of the Chinese Republic.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，日军曾两次占领福州。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, the Japanese army occupied Fuzhou twice.

description.zh-cn: 1949年8月17日，中国人民解放军攻占福州城。
description.en: On August 17, 1949, the People's Liberation Army captured Fuzhou city.

description.zh-cn: 时任福州市委书记习近平谋划了“福州3820工程”战略，目标是让福州成为国际化大都市。
description.en: When he was the Party Secretary of Fuzhou, Xi Jinping masterminded the 'Fuzhou 3820 Project' strategy, aiming to transform Fuzhou into an international metropolis.

description.zh-cn: 清末组织福州人移民砂拉越的诗巫垦荒。
description.en: In the late Qing dynasty, he organized people from Fuzhou to immigrate to Sibu, Sarawak, for land reclamation.

description.zh-cn: 围棋大师吴清源出生于福州。
description.en: Go master Go Seigen was born in Fuzhou.
